MacroOp.Name: OMNI_OS_QNX
MacroOp.Considerations: OS detection via preprocessor flags is not always guaranteed as they can be explicitly defined by a user. Take care when relying on these macros to determine platform specifics.
MacroOp.Synopsis:
If compilation happens on a platform (or with a compiler) with certain preprocessor flags, this macro is defined.
See @h omni/defs/os.hpp @h for which flags enable this option.
